title: Amanda Knox üëç
description:
Amanda Knox (The Truth About Crime, Labyrinths) talks to Justin about her experience being wrongfully convicted of murder, she reflects on her turbulent experience with the media, and she tells a sweet story about how she met her husband. 


Support us by supporting our sponsors! 


Vuori - To get 20% off your first purchase, go to vuoriclothing.com/LONG 

Talkspace - Get $100 off of your first month. To match with a license therapist today, go to talkspace.com or download the app

Calibrate - To save $50 off of a one year membership, to go JoinCalibrate.com and enter the code LONG

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
